hero.title: Protect Your WordPress Content
hero.subtitle: Simple plugin that blocks text selection and copying on your website

features.title: Main Features
features.feature1-desc: Blocks text selection to prevent easy copying
features.feature2-desc: Administrators and editors can copy without restrictions
features.feature3-desc: Set up in minutes from the WordPress panel
features.feature4-desc: Define where to allow selection (forms, code, etc.)

usage.title: How to Use
usage.step1-text: Go to Plugins → Installed Plugins and activate "Anti Copy-Paste".
usage.step2-text: Go to Settings → Anti Copy-Paste and configure:
usage.step3-text: Open your site in incognito mode and try to select text. You'll see it can't be copied.
